Destiny Wealth Crafter moved from Fortune centre to Sunshine plaza #Recommended. 3 in 1 session.
Tarot, numerology and Birth chart.

A place for students (aka slaves) to print their poster for presentation. Managed to print A1 for $10 at Ben Print. Happy to see feastables in a vending machine outside the mall (notice me Mr beast). Sadly, tastes like cheap chocolate but overpriced at 4 bars for $3.50.

Meanwhile, the mall is un-navigable. Worst floor plan ever seen (image attached). No escalator in the mall btw.

Lots of Parking lots -$2.35 for less than 30 mins. Not much people in mall. Stalls are all quiet. Went to STORE ART SUPPLIES to stock up the â€œSuper Doughâ€. Not only very little stock in the store plus the â€œlong hairâ€ guy is very rude and seems doesnâ€™t want to serve at all.
Nice little mall with good eateries and convenience shops. The best ones are Teng Bespoke vegetarian Japanese restaurant and â€œLetâ€™s Playâ€, the best place to buy Tomica toys.
